pinyin: shang1 han2 sha1 men2 shi4 jun1
di4 fang1 xing4 ban1 zhen3 shang1 han2
shu3 xing2 ban1 zhen3 shang1 han2
shu3 zao3 xing2 ban1 zhen3 shang1 han2

sentences.english: The former chief has got typhus fever on board.
sentences.chinese: 前任大副在船得過斑疹傷寒症。

sentences.english: Epidemic typhus is passed from human to human by the body louse.
sentences.chinese: 流行性斑疹傷寒是由體蝨在人與人之間傳播的。

sentences.english: Or, whether it fits for all diseases of internal medicine, not only those caused by exogenous pathogenic agents?
sentences.chinese: 六經辨證是否同時既適用於傷寒病又適用於雜病？

sentences.english: TYPICAL USE:When he got a shot against typhus, the child clenched his teeth in pain.
sentences.chinese: 當那小孩接受傷寒預防注射時，痛苦得緊咬着牙。

sentences.english: Treatment of all forms of typhus consists of similar antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 治療不同類型的斑疹傷寒可使用類似的抗生素。

sentences.english: Cholera and typhus outbreaks are common.
sentences.chinese: 霍亂和斑疹傷寒都時常發生。

sentences.english: In 1828, Mary became sick with typhoid fever.
All the children under 3 years old are to be vaccinated against typhus this Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 本週六所有3歲以下的兒童接種斑疹傷寒疫苗。

sentences.english: A sudden attack of typhoid cut him off in the prime of his life.
sentences.chinese: 傷寒突然發作，使他年紀輕輕就被奪去了生命。

sentences.english: The chapter Taiyang disease is an important component in Treatise on Cold Damage Diseases.
sentences.chinese: 太陽病篇是《傷寒論》主要組成部分。

sentences.english: The hospital ward was fumigated after the outbreak of typhus.
sentences.chinese: 斑疹傷寒以後，醫院的病房進行煙燻消毒。

sentences.english: Chi is a descriptive word describing the appearance of exogenous febrile fever.
sentences.chinese: “赤”當是一個標誌傷寒發熱貌的摹狀詞。

sentences.english: 5 out of 32 samples tested positive for S. Typhi.
sentences.chinese: 經檢測，32個樣本中有5個爲傷寒桿菌陽性。

sentences.english: Liu experienced, particularly the "typhoid fever" in-depth research.
sentences.chinese: 劉老經驗豐富，尤對《傷寒論》有深入的研究。

sentences.english: A triple serum has been developed to resist the Newcastledisease, colibacillosis and paretyphus avium in chickens.
sentences.chinese: 研製了抗雞新城疫大腸桿菌病副傷寒三聯血清。

sentences.english: Typhoid fever sneaks in when sanitation fails.
sentences.chinese: 環境衛生搞不好，傷寒就會乘虛而入。

definition: chest and hypochondrium/upper part of the body
evil influence/unhealthy trend/(a person's) evil air/aura of wickedness/(TCM) pathogenic energy (opposite: 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4], vital energy)
interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
